extension.name: BJ ImageSlider 2 Free
extension.author: The ByJoomla Team
extension.description: BJ! Image Slider 2 Free version (jQuery version). BJ! Image Slider component must be installed first

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: category_id
field.label: Category Id
field.description: Id of the Category that you want to show

field.name: ss_width
field.label: SlideShow Width
field.description: The width of the slideshow (in pixel)

field.name: ss_height
field.label: SlideShow Height
field.description: The height of the slideshow (in pixel)

field.name: ss_gallery_padding
field.label: Gallery border width
field.description: Gallery border width (in pixel)

field.name: ss_delay
field.label: Delay time
field.description: Delay time (in millisecond)

field.name: ss_duration
field.label: Duration time
field.description: Duration time (in millisecond)

field.name: ss_filmstrip_size
field.label: Filmstrip Size
field.description: Number of visible navigation buttons

field.name: ss_frame_gap
field.label: Navigation button margin
field.description: Navigation button margin (in px)

field.name: ss_caption_thickness
field.label: Caption Thickness
field.description: Caption Thickness (in pixels)

field.name: ss_caption_opacity
field.label: Caption Opacity
field.description: Caption Opacity (0-1)

field.name: ss_background
field.label: Slideshow background
field.description: Slideshow background (hexa color)

field.name: ss_overlay_background
field.label: Slideshow Text Panel background
field.description: Slideshow Text Panel (image description) background (hexa color)

field.name: ss_caption
field.label: Show caption
field.description: Select whether to show caption of images

field.name: ss_show_next_item_title
field.label: Show Next Item Title
field.description: Select whether to show next item title when mouse over on navigation buttons

field.name: ss_show_title_in_overlay
field.label: Show caption title
field.description: Show Item title on Caption panel

field.name: ss_pause_on_hover
field.label: Pause on Hover
field.description: Select whether to pause the animation when mouse over panels

field.name: ss_controller
field.label: Show Play/Pause button
field.description: Select whether to show controller buttons

field.name: ss_panel_gradient
field.label: Show panel gradient
field.description: Select whether to show panel gradient (enable this fieldter in PRO version)

field.name: ss_auto_hide_filmstrip
field.label: Auto hide filmstrip
field.description: Auto hide filmstrip when mouse out the panels

field.name: ss_paused
field.label: Auto start slideshow
field.description: Auto start slideshow when it is loaded?

field.name: ss_filmstrip
field.label: Show FilmStrip
field.description: Select whether to show the filmstrip

field.name: ss_filmstrip_position
field.label: FilmStrip Position
field.description: Select Filstrip Position (more position in PRO version)

field.name: ss_overlay_position
field.label: Caption Position
field.description: Select caption position (more position in PRO version)

field.name: ss_image_transition_effect
field.label: Image Transition effect
field.description: Image Transition effect (more effect in PRO version

field.name: ss_text_transition_effect
field.label: Text Transition effect
field.description: Text Transition effect (more effect in PRO version)

field.name: ss_panel_on_click
field.label: Panel On Click
field.description: What happens when user click on main image? (enable this fieldeter in PRO version

field.name: ss_easing_method
field.label: Transition Easing Method
field.description: Transition Easing Method (more method in PRO version)

field.name: need_jquery
field.label: Need JQuery?
field.description: Choose 'No' if you are sure that JQuery is loaded elsewhere. Choose 'Yes' if you are sure that JQuery is not loaded elsewhere
